name: umbilicus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the small, round part in the middle of the belly that is left after the umbilical cord (= the long tube of flesh joining the baby to its mother) has been cut at birth: Unlike other mammals, the human umbilicus is clearly visible. Synonyms
belly button informal or child's word
navel
tummy button UK informal child's word
